channel.title: Evelus - We need assistance!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,
The Evelus team is asking that we get a few people to help us out with our development. These developers will be ONLY working with the plugin environment and will help update the plugin API to be something that is easy to use. We will be hiring a few people to join the team and you will get access to the configuration website to help your development once it is online our server.
The web based tool our chosen developers will be using: [url=http://f.cl.ly/items/1A0L2m2D3Y123c2D1n0h/Screen%20Shot%202012-07-28%20at%202.22.09%20PM.png]screenshot[/url]
[b]Please inquire below or with SiniSoul.[/b]
- Evelus Team

item.title: Evelus - We need assistance!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

I’d love to help if I wasn’t so busy with football and other things that are much more important than this.

Read full topic

item.title: Evelus - We need assistance!
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Dalton59, post:3, topic:454889”]I would like to be part of the team, getting the item stats and coding it , pretty simple, but takes time.

I know everything about coding items on an rsps.[/quote]

I think I’m going to be looking for someone who is semi-known. Or at least someone I’m familiar with.

Read full topic
